document.full_text: five somali men were sentenced on monday to spend the rest of their lives in a u.s. prison after being convicted of piracy and trying to attack an american warship off the coast of africa last year.
document.title: somali pirates sentenced to life in u.s. prison
lines_and_colors: five somali men were sentenced on monday to spend the rest of their lives in a u.s. prison after being convicted of piracy and trying to attack an american warship off the coast of africa last year.
